hero.title: Hair Transplantation
hero.description: Modern FUE and DHI hair transplant methods in leading Istanbul clinics. Natural results, minimal invasiveness and lifetime guarantee.

why.title: Why Choose Turkey for Hair Transplantation
why.subtitle: Combination of high quality, affordable prices and world experience

leaders.title: World Leaders
leaders.desc: Turkey performs over 1.5 million hair transplants annually - more than any other country

guarantee.title: Lifetime Guarantee
guarantee.desc: Transplanted hair lasts a lifetime thanks to unique properties of the donor area

technology.title: Advanced Technology
technology.desc: FUE Sapphire and DHI methods ensure maximum density and natural results

specialists.title: Experienced Specialists
specialists.desc: Doctors perform 50-100 operations per month, accumulating unique experience and expertise

precision.title: Implantation Precision
precision.desc: Control of angle, direction and depth of each graft for perfect results

survival.title: High Survival Rate
survival.desc: Up to 95-98% of transplanted follicles successfully take root due to minimal time outside the body

methods.title: Hair Transplantation Methods
methods.subtitle: Choose the right technique based on your goals and budget

fue.title: FUE (Follicular Unit Extraction)
fue.desc: Classic method of extracting follicles one by one with minimal scarring

sapphire.title: FUE Sapphire
sapphire.desc: Use of sapphire blades for more precise channels and faster healing

dhi.title: DHI (Direct Hair Implantation)
dhi.desc: Direct implantation using Choi Pen without preliminary channels

dhiPrp.title: DHI + PRP Therapy
dhiPrp.desc: Combination of DHI with platelet-rich plasma for improved growth and density

beard.title: Beard Transplant
beard.desc: Restoration of beard and mustache density with natural results

afro.title: Afro Transplantation
afro.desc: Specialized technique for curly and kinky hair

benefits.title: What's Included in the Price
benefits.description: Comprehensive package with accommodation, transfer and everything needed for comfortable treatment.
list: Free online hair analysis and consultation

process.title: How Transplantation Works
process.subtitle: From first contact to thick hair - just 4 steps

analysis.title: Online Analysis
analysis.desc: Send photos, receive free analysis and treatment plan from specialist

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.desc: Book hotel and transfer, conduct pre-operative tests

operation.title: Surgery
operation.desc: Extraction and implantation of grafts (6-8 hours) under local anesthesia

result.title: Result
result.desc: First hair after 3 months, final result after 12-18 months

results.title: Turkey - World Capital of Hair Transplantation
results.subtitle: Over 500,000 patients annually choose Turkish clinics for hair restoration

contact.title: Get Free Hair Analysis
contact.subtitle: Send photos and find out the exact cost and number of grafts

natural.title: Natural Result

individual.title: Individual Plan

fast.title: Fast Effect
fast.desc: Results visible immediately after procedure, maximum effect in 7-14 days

minimal.title: Minimal Time

treatments.title: Our Aesthetic Medicine Services
treatments.subtitle: Wide range of non-surgical procedures for beauty and rejuvenation

botox.title: Botox
botox.desc: Smoothing facial wrinkles on forehead, between eyebrows and around eyes

fillers.title: Dermal Fillers
fillers.desc: Restoring volume of lips, cheeks and correcting nasolabial folds

mesotherapy.title: Mesotherapy
mesotherapy.desc: Vitamin cocktail injections to improve skin quality and hydration

prp.title: PRP Therapy
prp.desc: Platelet-rich plasma for skin rejuvenation and regeneration stimulation

peeling.title: Chemical Peel
peeling.desc: Skin renewal, reduction of pigmentation and texture improvement

laser.title: Laser Resurfacing
laser.desc: Removal of scars, wrinkles and improvement of overall skin tone

threads.title: Thread Lift
threads.desc: Face and neck lifting with biodegradable threads

removal.title: Lesion Removal
removal.desc: Safe removal of moles, papillomas and other benign formations

contouring.title: Facial Contouring
contouring.desc: Correction of chin, cheekbones and other facial areas with fillers
